  • Method Details

    • get_AttackValue

      public int get_AttackValue()
      Description copied from class: FightingEntity
      Gets the Attack Value of a Fighting Entity. The maximal Damage a Fighting Entity can make. It can be mitigated by the Defense Value.
      Overrides:
      get_AttackValue in class FightingEntity
      Returns:
      A double how much Damage the Fighting Entity can make.
